meanings.definition: Excessive confidence or certainty in one's own abilities or opinions.
meanings.sent1: His cocksurenesses led him to believe he could do anything.
meanings.sent2: Her cocksurenesses often rubbed people the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cocksurenesses, he still managed to make mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The boxer's cocksurenesses in the ring were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The politician's cocksurenesses made him a formidable opponent.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly confident or sure of oneself.
meanings.sent1: The team's cocksurenesses cost them the game.
meanings.sent2: She exuded cocksurenesses in every decision she made.
meanings.sent3: His cocksurenesses were put to the test when he faced a new challenge.
meanings.sent4: The CEO's cocksurenesses were evident in every speech he gave.
meanings.sent5: The student's cocksurenesses made him a natural leader among his peers.
